com.cba.simulator.model

Class PredictionFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cba.simulator.model.PredictionFunction

  • public class PredictionFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for the following,
    • Predicts the future weather parameter using ARIMA model.
    • Identify weather type using the predicted parameters.
    Author:
    Gills Antony

    • Method Detail

      • predictWeather

        public SimulatorOutputDTO predictWeather(java.util.List<WeatherDetailsDO> weatherDetails,
                                         SimulatorOutputDTO outputDO)
        This method is used to predict the weather details for a single day (-d option).
        Parameters:
        weatherDetails - - list of weather details of one particular day of year of a location.
        outputDO - - predicted output conditions.
        Returns:
        predicted output environment details of particular location for one day.

      • getLocationWeatherInfo

        public SimulatorOutputDTO getLocationWeatherInfo(java.util.List<WeatherDetailsDO> weatherDetails,
                                                 SimulatorOutputDTO simulatedOutputDO)
        This Method performs the mathematical calculations to obtain the weather informations.
        Parameters:
        weatherDetails - - list of weather details of one particular day of year of a location.
        simulatedOutputDO - - predicted output conditions.
        Returns:
        predicted output environment details of particular location for one.

      • predictWeatherParams

        public double predictWeatherParams(double[] inputData)
        This method generates forecast values based on input values. The prediction model is based on ARIMA. Reference: https://github.com/Workday/timeseries-forecast. ARIMA model parameters are passed to obtain forecast result.
        Parameters:
        inputData - - input data
        Returns:
        double[] forecastData, forecasted output

      • getWeatherCondition

        public java.lang.String getWeatherCondition(double temperature,
                                            double pressure)
        predict the weather type based on the weather parameters.
        Parameters:
        temperature - - temperature
        pressure - - pressure
        Returns:
        weather type - predicted weather type
